Smart Sandwich Toaster: Develop a smart sandwich toaster that can detect the type of bread and cheese you're using and automatically adjust the toasting settings for the best results.
Multi-Function Sandwich Toaster: Create a sandwich toaster that can not only toast sandwiches but also grill, bake, and cook other food items.
Portable Sandwich Toaster: Design a compact and portable sandwich toaster that can be taken on the go.
Customizable Sandwich Toaster: Create a sandwich toaster that allows you to customize the toasting settings to your liking, including temperature, time, and even the shape of the toast.
Smart Sandwich Toaster App: Develop a smartphone app that can control a sandwich toaster remotely, allowing you to toast sandwiches from anywhere in the world.
